title: Hextech Crafting bug
body: Whenever i click the button to get into hextech crafting, an "unknown error" screen pops up. Hextech just...Doesnt load.

replies.body: There were some issues last night per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything should be fine now, but let me know if you're still having this problem!
There is a chat issue that may be the source of the problem. To can check here for any updates to the issue ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ).
